meanings.definition: A disease caused by an uncontrolled division of abnormal cells in a part of the body.
meanings.sent1: My grandma fought cancer bravely and won.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the tumor was cancer.
meanings.sent3: Even though it sounds strange, the cancer cells were having a party in my body.
meanings.sent4: The cancer of corruption spread through the organization.
meanings.sent5: The cancer of negativity can spread quickly if not stopped.

meanings.definition: A malignant growth or tumor resulting from the division of abnormal cells.
meanings.sent1: The biopsy confirmed it was cancer growing inside him.
meanings.sent2: The cancer had spread to her lymph nodes.
meanings.sent3: The garden was full of flowers, but a cancerous weed threatened to take over.
meanings.sent4: The cancer of jealousy consumed her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The cancer of doubt gnawed at his confidence.
